metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10889 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in moodle before versions 3.5.1, 3.4.4, 3.3.7. No optionexisted to omit logs from data privacy exports, which may contain detailsof other users who interacted with the requester.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
